cu.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and may prevent proper hardware initialization in the CU.

du.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and may prevent proper hardware initialization in the DU.
du.explanation_zh: 將硬體日誌等級設定為無效的枚舉值 'invalid'，會導致日誌配置錯誤，並可能阻止 DU 中硬體的正確初始化。
